name: @bentley/itwinui
author: Bentley Systems
description: CSS (Sass/SCSS) library for building beautiful and well working web UI components within Bentley Systems & iTwin.js applications.

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:scss && yarn build:css && yarn build:html && yarn copy-files
scripts.build:html: html-minifier --input-dir ./backstop/tests --output-dir ./backstop/minified --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --collapse-inline-tag-whitespace && yarn print "Finished minifying HTML files."
scripts.build:watch: yarn build && concurrently -n scss,html -k "yarn build:watch:scss" "yarn build:watch:html"
scripts.copy-files: cpx package.json lib && cpx README.md lib
scripts.postcss-processing: postcss lib/css --use autoprefixer --use postcss-discard-comments -d lib/css --no-map && yarn print "Finished post-processing CSS."
